title: NA Deputy Speaker mourns demise of MNA Asma Alamgir’s father
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 18 (APP):National Assembly Deputy Speaker Syed Ghulam Mustafa Shah on Friday expressed deep sorrow over the passing of the father of MNA Asma Arbab Alamgir.
In a condolence message, he extended heartfelt sympathies to Asma and her family, stating, “My thoughts and prayers are with Ms Asma Alamgir and her entire family during this difficult time.”
Deputy Speaker Shah prayed for the departed soul’s elevation in Jannah and forgiveness, and for the bereaved family’s strength to bear this irreparable loss with patience.
